body:
Yes, that was the original plan. But when I did that, an url like `.../conferences/new` would raise a 404: file with id: new not found. That is a bit clumsy, isn't it?
EDIT: 
I found that with the CanCanCan redirecting gone, we lost the nice redirects. So I let the orga basecontroller take over the redirecting. See [this commit](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/546/commits/7b2fb2a2e563a94131dcf5ea3a398b037bff4e89)
Do you agree, or...?
